TextLibrary.Text: Having defeated you, the Imp flies off. There are plenty more here though.
You have defeated an Imp, but there appear to be plenty more here.
You have delivered the Emperor's reply to your Queen. She rewards you well.
You must return the Emperor's reply to Bartonia, but you may visit the Dark Path Shrine on the way if you wish.
You must return the Emperor's reply to Bartonia, or you may continue fighting Imps at the Dark Path Shrine.
